name: Bad Game (ForestoShen)
description:
Oh no! This game is broken, but you have a map editor to copy and paste thing... can you help fix the game and find the sources of all bug?

Control: Arror key to move, c to copy, v to paste, r to restart

May upload a English version later but the puzzle is pretty easy so the text hints is not really neccesary

Some of tiles and BGM from (https://github.com/analgesicproductions/Anodyne-1-Repo)

~网易2020minigame参加作品~
